name: redcap-project-creation
label: REDCap Project Creation
description: A gear to create REDCap projects using the REDCap API
author: NACC

input_file.description: YAML file with REDCap project details for the study

apikey_path_prefix.description: The instance specific AWS parameter path prefix for apikey

super_token_path.description: AWS parameter path for REDCap super api token

project_token_path.description: AWS parameter path prefix to store REDCap project api token

admin_project.description: Flywheel lookup string for the admin project

use_xml_template.description: Use XML template to create REDCap projects

output_file_name.description: Output file name to save metadata details (will be prefixed with study id)

dry_run.description: Whether to do a dry run (only generates the metadata file)
